short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this Chrome extension to keep track of hackers and manage your hacker list directly from Battlelog.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The screenshots show how to add a hacker to your list, what a Battlelog user profile looks like when you have flagged them as a hacker, visual indication of a server check in progress and what servers in your list look like when a hacker is currently playing on them.
